Detailed Description

This is the base class for all states the state machine handles

Member Function Documentation

virtual void IState::activate ( IState *  pPrevious  )  [pure virtual]

This method is called when a state is activated. You can use this method e.g. to load a scene

Parameters:
pPrevious the state that is stopped

Implemented in CStateDemo, and CStateSetup.

virtual void IState::deactivate ( IState *  pNext  )  [pure virtual]

This method is called when a state is stopped. You can use this method e.g. to clear your scene

Parameters:
pNext the next state that runs

Implemented in CStateDemo, and CStateSetup.

virtual u32 IState::update (  )  [pure virtual]

This method is called once per frame and can be used to do something

Returns:
"0" if no state change is needed, The index of the new state +1 otherwise

Implemented in CStateDemo, and CStateSetup.
